We have a name "Знайка". That's a character. Need canonicalName normalized nominative; "Знайка" is already nominative. Aliases: maybe other forms in text? Only appears as "Знайка". No other forms. Gender? Znaika? In Russian literature, Znaika is a male friend of Doctor... In "Трое из Простоквашино"? Actually "Знайка" is a male child character in some Russian children's books, but need to be based on evidence. The text doesn't provide gender. We cannot assume. So gender unknown.

Description: need 1-3 sentences strictly grounded in evidence: He is the speaker who said "Верно!" and is described as "подхватил Знайка" (Znaika interjected). So we can say: Знайка is the person who interjects with "Верно!" in the dialogue. That's the description.

Return JSON array with one object.
